data.title: Evonik on LinkedIn: Blue Lithium technology
data.meta_description: The trend towards e-mobility is steadily increasing. The batteries of electric vehicles require lithium. At present, however, up to 95 percent is not recycledâ€¦

True leaders don't just talk; they take action and go beyond! On the pitch, in the lab and in the plant. That's what makes the partnership between Evonik and Borussia Dortmund so special. ğŸ–¤ğŸ’› âš½ Learn more about it here: https://lnkd.in/ewh_rDNQ #Evonik #ActLikeALeader #BVB

Big praise for Pravin from India! ğŸ‰ The Marketing Manager from Evonik has been campaigning against water scarcity in his home country for eight years. And with great success! Along with 25 classmates from his previous school, Pravin organized campaigns at his home village and encouraged people for voluntary work, all together with the Paani Foundation. They build pits to collect rainwater and planted many about 100 new trees. ğŸŒ³ The soil was provided with an aggregate storage capacity of 100 billion liters of water. The results: The groundwater level rose and water deliveries by tanker were no longer necessary. ğŸ’¦ Are you also committed to the environment? ğŸŒ± #Evonik #Volunteering #DoingGoodTogether #ThereforOthers

Congratulations! ğŸ–ï¸ On July 15, 1854, the 1st General German Industrial Exhibition opened in Munich at the instigation of King Maximilian II of Bavaria in the "Glass Palace", which was built especially for the occasion. ğŸ« 6,588 exhibitors presented a wide range of products in the Bavarian capital. Among them was Friedrich Ernst Roessler, who was even awarded a prize "for his flourishing gold and silver separating business". Roessler's precious metal refinery formed the basis for the founding of Evonik's predecessor Degussa in 1873. The medal from Munich is the first award that the Group has ever received. ğŸ‘ #Evonik #EvonikHistory #tbt Image: Munich City Museum (CC BY SA 4.0)

Today is World Emoji Day ğŸŒ Watch as Frank, Angela, and Verena describe their jobs using only three emojis! Can you guess what they do? How would you describe your job with only three emojis? #PartofSomethingSpecial #Evonik #LeadingBeyondChemistry #WorldEmojiDay #GuessMyJob

ğŸ’‰#Squalene is used in vaccine adjuvant systems to boost the active pharmaceutical ingredient (API). This means less active ingredient is required to achieve the same outcome, which has multiple benefits. For example, patients may experience fewer side effects. And vaccine manufacturers can produce more vaccines with the same amount of API. ğŸ¤” Whereâ€™s the problem? Pharma-grade squalene is currently derived from sharks.ğŸ¦ˆ But many sharks are endangered species - killing sharks decimates marine ecosystems. ğŸ™ŒğŸŒ¿ Good news! There is an alternative. We have developed PhytoSqueneÂ® - the first GMP-grade squalene. Made from amaranth oil, this squalene is suitable for pharmaceutical applications. We help you offer safe and effective vaccines while preserving biodiversity! ğŸ‘‰ Learn more about the benefits of PhytoSqueneÂ® and what this means for your vaccine development project on our website: https://ow.ly/FAAQ50SE7LZ #Evonik #DrugDelivery #HealthCare # #Adjuvants Evonik Health Care

ğŸ“¢ On July 11th, we celebrated the 10th anniversary of our plant in Rosario, Argentina, with the inauguration ceremony of its 50% expansion in annual sodium methylate production capacity to 90,000 tons. The event was attended by Argentine authorities and industry leaders, as well as employees and partners. Dr. Harald Schwager, a member of Evonik's Executive Board who was present at the event, said: "South America is a significant strategic growth region for us and we are pursuing our goal of being close to our customers, both in South and North America and in the Asian marketâ€. With the successful completion of the expansion of sodium methylate production in Argentina, we reinforce our position as a world leader in solutions for the biofuels industry with an active role in promoting sustainability. âœ… Find out more about this investment: https://ow.ly/Gc0P50SCi82 #Evonik #Argentina #LeadingBeyondChemistry #Investment #Biofuels #Sustainability
